message: I suggest a 60-40 split in my favor, considering we both want to avoid inflation eating into our gains. This is a fair offer that gives us both a substantial amount.

Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking for a more equitable split. Since inflation affects you more than me (20% vs 10%), we both benefit from concluding quickly. This 55-45 split in my favor acknowledges the different inflation rates while giving us both a substantial amount. This is better for you than losing another 20% in value by continuing to negotiate.
